title: Best wallet for beginners in 2025?
content:
I'm completely new to crypto and blockchain. There are so many wallet options - MetaMask, Trust Wallet, Coinbase Wallet, hardware wallets like Ledger...

What should I consider when choosing my first wallet?

**My needs:**
- Easy to use (I'm not technical)
- Secure (obviously!)
- Works with popular DApps
- Good customer support
- Mobile and desktop access

**Budget:** Up to $200 if hardware wallet is worth it

Any recommendations with pros/cons would be super helpful!
